description: The ECR electronics causes a signal delay which has to be corrected in the SAR measurements. The effect was calibrated with a set of reference ECR, yielding a model that describes the delay as a function of orbit geometry and incidence angle. The model is evaluated for each acquisition and the results are stored the in dedicated correction files. Product details available at: https://www.asg.ed.tum.de/fileadmin/w00cip/iapg/Baltic/SAR-HSU-TN-0019_Dataset_User_Manual.pdf
title: COR-EC2: ECR Electronic Delay Correction_Baltics_Multimission
osc:project: BALTIC+ Geodetic SAR for Baltic Height System Unification (SAR-HSU)
